about_the_game:
All of us have a dream. Be it making a lot of money, fixing mistakes of our past, acquiring a huge harem, or even fondling some boobs... These dreams are so different but oh so important! They give us strength and inspiration to stand up and move forward, despite everything. Truly, a marvelous trait unique to us as a species!

As for Anne's dream, well... Let's just say her dream is unusual and may seem weird to most normal people. You see, she wants to be... taken in a rough manner. Who are we to judge her, though? Different strokes for different folks, and all that!

Join Anne in her adventure of making her ultimate dream come true! There is nothing and no one that could stand in the way of her pursuing that goal, whether it's furries, horny men, or even... Well, you know what I mean.

Choose your destiny: a comedic retelling of Anne's adventures or something a little bit more raunchy. No matter what you choose, you can expect an ocean of humor and beautiful visuals!

💜 Two different versions of the story to choose from— hentai hotness or comedic adventures. Follow whichever you like more and dive into an extremely unusual story. Play and enjoy yourself!

💜 Juicy 2D art with animated H-scenes. Warning: your little friend will need some rest after having this much fun!

💜 TRULY daring, slutty humor and passionate 18+ scenes

💜 Dive into an exciting story that is sure to make your evening better and leave you with a lot of positive emotions. Innocent Grape is a wild ride—it's simply impossible to stay indifferent after seeing those furries and perverted old men.

💜 References to famous hentai media. Find them all and feel like a real hentai expert! With a boost of confidence and respect for your legendary figure as a bonus!

💜 You will also have an opportunity to prevent the heroine from fulfilling her dreams and enjoy the ridiculous situations she gets herself into. Doesn't that sound likea good change of pace? After all, fun comes in all shapes and sizes, right?

highlighted.name: They let us use the vacuum scene!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains adult content and sexual scenes with various fetishes that some viewers may find offensive: blowjob, threesome (MMF) and foursome (MMMF), sex machine (tentacles), masturbation, lesbian, peeking, furry, oral, vaginal, anal and non-penetrative sexual acts. 

The game contains nudity, consensual and non-consensual sex, violence, sexual violence (rape, abuse, fake hypnosis), alternative lifestyles, blackmail, use and sale of alcohol and drugs, swearing.

All characters in the game are adults and work in an office. Our game is instructive and humorous, in the game you will find tips on how not to get into adventures of a sexual nature. In the club Anne tries alcohol.

detailed_description:
💖 ADD OUR GAMES TO YOUR WISHLIST 💖


About the Game

All of us have a dream. Be it making a lot of money, fixing mistakes of our past, acquiring a huge harem, or even fondling some boobs... These dreams are so different but oh so important! They give us strength and inspiration to stand up and move forward, despite everything. Truly, a marvelous trait unique to us as a species!

As for Anne's dream, well... Let's just say her dream is unusual and may seem weird to most normal people. You see, she wants to be... taken in a rough manner. Who are we to judge her, though? Different strokes for different folks, and all that!

Join Anne in her adventure of making her ultimate dream come true! There is nothing and no one that could stand in the way of her pursuing that goal, whether it's furries, horny men, or even... Well, you know what I mean.

Choose your destiny: a comedic retelling of Anne's adventures or something a little bit more raunchy. No matter what you choose, you can expect an ocean of humor and beautiful visuals!

💜 Two different versions of the story to choose from— hentai hotness or comedic adventures. Follow whichever you like more and dive into an extremely unusual story. Play and enjoy yourself!

💜 Juicy 2D art with animated H-scenes. Warning: your little friend will need some rest after having this much fun!

💜 TRULY daring, slutty humor and passionate 18+ scenes

💜 Dive into an exciting story that is sure to make your evening better and leave you with a lot of positive emotions. Innocent Grape is a wild ride—it's simply impossible to stay indifferent after seeing those furries and perverted old men.

💜 References to famous hentai media. Find them all and feel like a real hentai expert! With a boost of confidence and respect for your legendary figure as a bonus!

💜 You will also have an opportunity to prevent the heroine from fulfilling her dreams and enjoy the ridiculous situations she gets herself into. Doesn't that sound likea good change of pace? After all, fun comes in all shapes and sizes, right?
name: Innocent Grape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Comedy and hentai! Name a more iconic duo! Play the role of promiscuous Anne in this 2D Visual Novel. Help fulfill all her crazy sexual fantasies and make her dream come true! There's no way anything could go wrong, right...?
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, German, Indonesian, Dutch, Polish, Turkish
